db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates combining Qt Quick and three.js rendering.
This documentation was introduced in QtCanvas3D 1.0.

db:article.db:programlisting: <RCC> <qresource prefix="/"> <file>planets.qml</file> <file>PlanetButton.qml</file> <file>InfoSheet.qml</file> <file>StyledSlider.qml</file> <file>FpsDisplay.qml</file> <file alias="three.js">../../3rdparty/three.js</file> <file alias="ControlEventSource.qml">../controls/ControlEventSource.qml</file> <file
